snippet: Morgan Stanley’s chief executive, James P. Gorman, saw his compensation drop 25 percent in 2011, a year in which the bank’s stock price fell about 44 percent.
abstract: Morgan Stanley’s chief executive, James P. Gorman, saw his compensation drop 25 percent in 2011, a year in which the bank’s stock price fell about 44 percent.

headline.main: Morgan Stanley Chief Collected $10.5 Million for 2011
